title: 13.5.4 PagerDuty/OpsGenie alerting integration
body:
# Objective
Integrate PagerDuty or OpsGenie for intelligent alert routing, on-call management, and incident response coordination.

## Requirements
- Choose alerting platform (PagerDuty or OpsGenie)
- Set up account and configure services
- Integrate with CloudWatch Alarms via SNS
- Configure escalation policies
- Set up on-call schedules
- Implement alert grouping and deduplication
- Configure alert severity levels
- Set up notification channels (SMS, phone, push)
- Create incident response runbooks
- Integrate with Slack for team collaboration
- Configure alert analytics and reporting

## Acceptance Criteria
- Alerting platform account configured
- CloudWatch alarms routing to platform
- Escalation policies defined
- On-call schedule created
- Test alerts delivered successfully
- Runbooks linked to alerts
- Incident response tested
- Alert fatigue minimized with grouping
- Team trained on incident response

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Requires: #146 (CloudWatch monitoring)
- Related: #166 (Application metrics)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 5
**Time:** 1 week
**Complexity:** Medium
